sensortoolkit._analysis.concurr_deploy_grps.Measure_Recording_Interval¶

Measure_Recording_Interval(df, warning=False)[source]¶

Compute recording interval for dataframe.

Compute time delta between successive timestamps and take the mode of recorded time deltas to be the device recording interval.

Parameters

df (pandas dataframe) – A dataframe with time-like index.

Returns

A string describing the most common (mode) recording interval in the dataframe.

Return type

interval_str (str)

sensortoolkit
